issue.title: [C#] Decide how to read message lengths - little-endian or machine dependent
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6553](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6553). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See the discussion [here\|[https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5280#discussion_r323896532]]. We are currently reading message lengths using machine dependent endianness. Should this be changed to little-endian all the time?

It appears the C++ implementation does this same thing - use machine dependent endianness.
